p: The minimal inhibitory concentrations (MICs) of both extracts are reported in Table 1. Both plants X. aethiopica and M. myristica had the same MIC values of 0.625 mg/mL and 2.5 mg/mL on C. albicans and E. coli, respectively. However, M. myristica had better activity than X. aethiopica on S. aureus, while P. aeruginosa was more susceptible to X. aethiopica than M. myristica. The lowest MIC value was 0.1325 mg/mL, exhibited by M. myristica on S. aureus.
